text: I have a non-julia repository running 144  github actions jobs in CI.  one of them is failing during the post cache job for some random github issues.  how awesome would be to be able to rerun only the failing job instead of all the other 143 jobs? :face_with_rolling_eyes:

elements.text: I have a non-julia repository running 144  github actions jobs in CI.  one of them is failing during the post cache job for some random github issues.  how awesome would be to be able to rerun only the failing job instead of all the other 143 jobs?

text: Nah I don't think anyone else would ever want that feature :joy:

elements.text: Nah I don't think anyone else would ever want that feature

text: How long can it take them to do it? Half a day, just to be very generous?
